chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T), TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseVarIsIdentity -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> Pun2

Premises:
Record TraverseVarIsIdentity (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity { traverse_var_is_identity : forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t } Arguments TraverseVarIsIdentity {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record Traverse (V T : Type) : Type := Build_Traverse { traverse : (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T } Arguments Traverse (_ _)%type_scope Arguments Build_Traverse [V T]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record TraverseIdentifiesVar (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) : Prop := Build_TraverseIdentifiesVar { traverse_identifies_var : forall (f : nat -> nat -> V) (l x : nat), traverse f l (var x) = f l x } Arguments TraverseIdentifiesVar {V}%type_scope {H H0} Arguments Build_TraverseIdentifiesVar [V]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record TraverseFunctorial (V : Type) (H : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseFunctorial { traverse_functorial : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (t : T) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t } Arguments TraverseFunctorial {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseFunctorial [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record Var (V : Type) : Type := Build_Var { var : nat -> V } Arguments Var _%type_scope Arguments Build_Var [V]%type_scope _%function_scope
SubstVar_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) (H2 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) => {| subst_var := fun (a : V) (k x : nat) => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = subst_idx a k x) (eq_ind_r (fun v : V => subst_idx v (0 + k) x = subst_idx a k x) eq_refl (lift_zero 0 a)) (traverse_identifies_var (fun l x0 : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 a) (l + k) x0) 0 x) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseVarIsIdentity -> SubstVar Arguments SubstVar_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}
Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t) -> TraverseVarIsIdentity
LiftZero_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) => {| lift_zero := fun (k : nat) (t : V) => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = t) eq_refl (traverse_var_is_identity (fun l x : nat => var (lift 0 (l + k) x)) (fun l x : nat => eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => var n = var x) eq_refl (lift_zero (l + k) x)) t 0) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseVarIsIdentity -> LiftZero Arguments LiftZero_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}
Build_TraverseFunctorial : forall (V : Type) (H : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (t : T) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t) -> TraverseFunctorial
Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
LiftVar_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) => {| lift_var := fun w k x : nat => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = var ((let (lift) := Lift_idx in lift) w k x)) eq_refl (traverse_identifies_var (fun l x0 : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x0)) 0 x) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseIdentifiesVar -> LiftVar Arguments LiftVar_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}
Build_Pun2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t) -> Pun2
LiftInjective_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) (H1 : TraverseVarInjective) => {| lift_injective := fun (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T) (H2 : traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t1 = traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t2) => traverse_var_injective (fun l x : nat => lift w (l + k) x) (fun (x1 x2 l : nat) (H3 : lift w (l + k) x1 = lift w (l + k) x2) => lift_injective w (l + k) x1 x2 H3) t1 t2 0 H2 |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V...
Build_TraverseIdentifiesVar : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), (forall (f : nat -> nat -> V) (l x : nat), traverse f l (var x) = f l x) -> TraverseIdentifiesVar
Build_TraverseVarInjective : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2) -> TraverseVarInjective
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
Build_PunPun : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> PunPun
Build_Rotate1SelfInverse : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall t : T, rotate 1 (rotate 1 t) = t) -> Rotate1SelfInverse
Build_Pun1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) (S k) (shift k t) = t) -> Pun1
rotate = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) (n : nat) (t : T) => subst (var n) 0 (shift (S n) t) : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Lift T -> Subst V T -> nat -> T -> T Arguments rotate {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} _%nat_scope
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
Record TraverseVarInjective (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseVarInjective { traverse_var_injective : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments TraverseVarInjective {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseVarInjective [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record Pun2 (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_Pun2 { pun_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t } Arguments Pun2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_Pun2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftSubst1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)) -> LiftSubst1
Build_LiftSubst2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> LiftSubst2
Build_TraverseRelative : forall (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t) -> TraverseRelative
Build_SubstLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t) -> SubstLift
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record PunPun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_PunPun { pun_pun : forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments PunPun {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_PunPun [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record LiftSubst1 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst1 { lift_subst_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) } Arguments LiftSubst1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
traverse = fun (V T : Type) (Traverse0 : Traverse V T) => let (traverse) := Traverse0 in traverse : forall V T : Type, Traverse V T -> (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T Arguments traverse {V T}%type_scope {Traverse} _%function_scope _%nat_scope
subst_idx = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (v : V) (k x : nat) => match lt_eq_lt_dec x k with | inleft (left _) => var x | inleft (right _) => v | inright _ => var (x - 1) end : forall V : Type, Var V -> V -> nat -> nat -> V Arguments subst_idx {V}%type_scope {H} _ (_ _)%nat_scope
LiftLift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) (H2 : TraverseFunctorial) (H3 : TraverseRelative) (H4 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) => {| lift_lift := fun (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat) (H5 : k <= s) => eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => t0 = traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift ws (l + (wk + s)) x)) 0 (traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift wk (l + k) x)) 0 t)) (eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift wk (l + k) (lift ws (l + s) x))) 0 t = t0) (traverse_extensional H3 (fun...
Record TraverseRelative (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseRelative { traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t } Arguments TraverseRelative {V T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_TraverseRelative [V T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
